caption:
Stallman Sez:

I am looking for people to American Promise (americanpromise.net) is looking for a Boston  area  volunteer to help suggest and implement changes to their web site to  reduce use of DropBox and nonfree JavaScript code. Ideally it would  function properly even with JavaScript disabled. 

  To volunteer, please write to Johannes  Epke   and to me at rms at gnu dot org.
title: Volunteer
